nodes.text: The Non-Sentient Professional Greenputt Tour was one of the major greenputt leagues. It was formed in 22 BBY by the Greenputt Governing Council after the council certified the skills of the Taurill Bortis and three Ambrian neeks. Participation in the league was presumably intended to be restricted to non- and semi-sentient creatures only; however, despite its official classification as semi-sentient, the Taurill species was in fact fully sentient.

The Non-Sentient Professional Greenputt Tour was first mentioned in the in-universe news story "Yet Another Greenputt League," which announced the league's creation. The article was published on the HoloNet News website in 2002.
